PcDocRules.RuleExpr: The target entity is equal to OrderDtl value
The target entity is equal to QuoteDtl value
The target entity is equal to JobHead value

PcDocRulesExpr.LValue: QuoteDtl.WarrantyCode = Inputs.chk_overridewarranty.Value == true && Inputs.var_warrantycode.Value != "" ? Inputs.var_warrantycode.Value : Inputs.chr_warranty.Value;
OrderDtl.WarrantyCode = Inputs.chk_overridewarranty.Value == true && Inputs.var_warrantycode.Value != "" ? Inputs.var_warrantycode.Value : Inputs.chr_warranty.Value;

PcDynLst.Condition: return Inputs.chr_partsearch.Value == "" && Inputs.var_classcode.Value == "" && Inputs.RADIOSET3.Value == "1" ? true : false;
return Inputs.chr_partsearch.Value != "" && Inputs.RADIOSET1.Value == "1" && Inputs.RADIOSET3.Value == "1" ? true : false;
return Inputs.chr_partsearch.Value != "" && Inputs.RADIOSET1.Value == "2" && Inputs.RADIOSET3.Value == "1" ? true : false;
return Inputs.chr_partsearch.Value == "" && Inputs.var_classcode.Value == "" && Inputs.RADIOSET3.Value == "2" ? true : false;
return Inputs.chr_partsearch.Value != "" && Inputs.RADIOSET1.Value == "1" && Inputs.RADIOSET3.Value == "2" ? true : false;
return Inputs.chr_partsearch.Value != "" && Inputs.RADIOSET1.Value == "2" && Inputs.RADIOSET3.Value == "2" ? true : false;

PcInputs.SummaryLabel: Warning - Selecting this Check Box will clear all Entries:

PcInputs.OnLeave2: if cmb_sumsalescat = "Core" then var_sumsalesid = "COR". if cmb_sumsalescat = "Solution" then var_sumsalesid = "SOL". if cmb_sumsalescat = "" then var_sumsalesid = "".

PcInputs.ListItems: 1`All Active Parts~2`By Part Search~3`By Part Class

PcInputs.SideLabel: Note. Select a Pallet type first then add additional comments (if required).
Format '1' Refers to bom component level (.xxx) refers to weight measurement
Enter a Search Parameter to Filter the 'Select Part' drop down list.
Select Part to Appear on Sales Order Line.
Filter the 'Select Part' drop down box by Part Class.
BOM Cost Totals (Material Cost Per Unit + Up-Charge Applied).
The Configurator was unable to identify costs for all components within the BOM.
Please request costings from the Operations department of the relevant Company.
Specifying a Pallet type will auto populate the Pack/Job Comment.

PcInputsExpr.Expression: return !(Inputs.chk_bespoke.Value == true || Inputs.chk_selectcommodity.Value == true ? true : false);
